value.title: Introducing new Azure API Management capabilities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Miao Jiang joins Scott Hanselman discuss the API economy and how companies must master the challenges inherent in building, maintaining, managing, and exposing APIs to participate. That's where Azure API Management can help. Azure API Management is a solution for publishing APIs to external and internal

value.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
value.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to recover from infrastructure and service failure, loss of data, and disasters by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

value.title: Edit code through branching and merging in Git
value.excerpt: Level up your Git knowledge by learning about how to keep code separate using branches and how to merge them later

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Detect and analyze faces with the Face service
value.excerpt: Face detection, analysis, and recognition is an important capability for artificial intelligence (AI) solutions. The Face cognitive service in Azure makes it easy integrate these capabilities into your applications.

value.title: Get started with Go
value.excerpt: Take your first steps with Go.

value.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
value.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

value.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Introduction to Docker containers
value.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
value.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Move Azure resources to another resource group
value.excerpt: Learn how to identify Azure resources you can move, and how to move them to a new resource group.

value.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

value.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Synthesize Text Input to Speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to synthesize text to speech using the Speech-to-Text service.

value.title: An overview of Azure Data Explorer (ADX) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Manoj Raheja joins Lara Rubbelke to demonstrate Azure Data Explorer (ADX) and provide an overview of the service from provisioning to querying. ADX is a fast, fully managed data analytics service for real-time analysis on large volumes of streaming data. It brings together a highly performant and scalable

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. In this episode, Narayan demonstrates how you can secure Azure PaaS resources and your Azure network using Private Link, and provide protection against data exfiltration.  8:45 - Demo  Azure Private Link overview https://aka.ms/azfr/610/01

value.title: How to export your resources to CSV using the Azure Portal | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: The Azure Portal allows you to customize the information you'd like to export. In this video of the Azure Portal "How To" Series, learn how to easily export your files to CSV.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com     Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to pin content to your Azure portal dashboard | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this episode of the #Azure Portal “How To” Series, learn how to pin content on the portal for easier access and monitoring. We'll go over how to choose a dashboard to pin to and the differences between a private and a shared dashboard.   Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com
